name: The Long Road North
description:
Find your way home in this immersive audiovisual adventure based on the music video of Cold Burn by Cult of Luna. Take control of the light itself and navigate through the dangerous maze inhabiting dangers such as dark tornados and unforgiving weather conditions, to find your way back home to the Mother Light. Along the way you may also encounter more lost lights to pick up and bring home.

The game invites an immersive audiovisual adventure through the dark landscapes supported by the song Cold Burn. The music is dynamic to navigating the game, so every experience will be unique and render a special version of the song.
